title: Manufacturing Design Engineer (MDE) - Brittles
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish.
description: Apple MDE’s are extraordinary engineers that provide end to end manufacturing and process solutions for key design features. This includes manufacturing process development and capability...
preferred_qualifications: Demonstrate hands-on mechanical ability,Demonstrate excellent written and verbal interpersonal skills.,Experience with highly cosmetic parts a plus as is experience in a manufacturing environment of consumer electronics or consumer plastic / sheet metal products,Be a self-starter by defining all engineering tasks to meet project objectives and have the ability to quickly learn about new processes with very little information provided,25% domestic and international travel required,BS, MS or PhD in mechanical, manufacturing or industrial engineering preferred
